text: @realDonaldTrump I WAS going to praise you on your efforts to keep the Coronavirus away, but @JoeBiden took credit for that. Then little @MikeBloomberg and the minions agreed we need to address the government in China, and YOU are the ONLY one that made trade FAIR #demdebateisajoke
